name: Patent-Landscape
description: Patent and prior art: key claims, assignees, freedom to operate.
strategy: 1) Search patents by topic and key terms. 2) Cluster by assignee and claim scope. 3) Note expiry dates and geography. 4) Flag potential FTO risks.
synthesis_instructions: Summarize: main assignees, key claims, potential blocking patents, and confidence. Include patent numbers and dates.
